knowledge_entries.question: How do I edit my profile?
knowledge_entries.answer: Click Profile ‚Üí Edit Profile. Upload your photo and banner, write your bio (300 chars), add social links, and save! Profiles 80%+ complete get 3x more subscribers. Make a great first impression!

knowledge_entries.question: What size should my profile photo be?
knowledge_entries.answer: Minimum 400√ó400 pixels, square format (1:1), max 5MB, JPG or PNG. Best practice: Clear face shot, good lighting, professional quality. Avoid group photos or heavy filters. Your photo is the first thing fans see!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I write a good bio?
knowledge_entries.answer: 300 character bio formula: Who you are + What content you create + Posting schedule + Call-to-action. Example: 'üèãÔ∏è Fitness coach | Daily workouts & meal plans | New content Mon/Wed/Fri | Subscribe for exclusive training! üëá' Use emojis, keywords, and be clear!

knowledge_entries.question: What banner size do I need?
knowledge_entries.answer: 1500√ó500 pixels (3:1 ratio) for desktop. Mobile crops it, so keep important elements centered. Use high-quality images that represent your brand. Update seasonally for freshness. Great banners increase profile engagement by 40%!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I get a custom URL?
knowledge_entries.answer: Settings ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí Custom URL. Choose 3-30 characters (letters, numbers, underscores). Example: boyfanz.com/yourname. Must be unique and it's permanent, so choose wisely! Makes your profile easy to share and professional.

knowledge_entries.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
knowledge_entries.answer: Settings ‚Üí Security ‚Üí Enable 2FA. Choose SMS or authenticator app. You'll need your password + code to login. HIGHLY recommended for account security! Protects against unauthorized access. Takes 2 minutes to set up.

knowledge_entries.question: How do I change my privacy settings?
knowledge_entries.answer: Settings ‚Üí Privacy. Control: Who sees content (public/followers/subscribers), who can message you, search visibility, and block users. Customize per your comfort level. You're in control of your creator experience!

knowledge_entries.question: Can I use a stage name instead of my real name?
knowledge_entries.answer: Absolutely! Your display name (what fans see) can be anything. Your legal name is only used for verification and payouts - fans never see it. Privacy protected! Use a stage name, brand name, or whatever represents you best.

knowledge_entries.question: How do I link my social media accounts?
knowledge_entries.answer: Profile ‚Üí Edit ‚Üí Social Links. Add Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, YouTube, etc. Benefits: Build trust, cross-promote, multiple touchpoints, grow all platforms. Only link accounts you want fans to see!

knowledge_entries.question: Why does profile completion matter?
knowledge_entries.answer: Profiles 80%+ complete get 3x more subscribers! Complete = trustworthy, professional, discoverable. Upload photo, banner, bio, link socials, verify email, add payout method, post content. Each % increases conversion. First impressions matter!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I manage notifications?
knowledge_entries.answer: Settings ‚Üí Notifications. Control email + push notifications for: new subscribers, messages, comments, tips, payouts. Set quiet hours for do-not-disturb. Choose real-time, daily digest, or weekly summary. Stay informed without overwhelm!

knowledge_entries.question: What are profile tags and categories?
knowledge_entries.answer: Tags help fans discover you: Fitness, Lifestyle, Gaming, Fashion, etc. Choose relevant categories in Profile ‚Üí Edit. You can select multiple! Better tags = better search ranking = more subscribers. Update as your content evolves.

knowledge_entries.question: How do I pin posts to my profile?
knowledge_entries.answer: Feature your best content! Click '...' on any post ‚Üí 'Pin to Profile'. Pin up to 3 posts. These show first on your profile - great first impression! Update regularly with latest best work. Pinned posts get 5x more views!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I block someone?
knowledge_entries.answer: Go to their profile ‚Üí '...' menu ‚Üí 'Block User'. Or Settings ‚Üí Privacy ‚Üí Blocked Users ‚Üí Add. Blocking prevents: all messages, viewing your content, commenting, tipping. They won't be notified. You control your space!

knowledge_entries.question: What's the difference between public and private profile?
knowledge_entries.answer: Public = anyone can find and view your profile (great for growth). Private = invite-only (more exclusive). Most creators use public for discovery. You can still control who sees specific content (subscribers-only posts). Choose based on your goals!
